data.title: Smart City
data.subTitle: Towards building Smart Cities: ICT Perspective
data.excerpt: Department of Computer Science and Engineering (DoCSE), Kathmandu University organizes one day workshop on Smart City in IT Park.

content.content: Department of Computer Science and Engineering (DoCSE), Kathmandu University organizes one day workshop on Smart City in IT Park, Banepa, Kavrepalanchok at 18th July, 2017.
